t: Is there a brand that sells snow shovels that are not made of cheap plastic that will crack after a year? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 7): I don’t know if it is about the brand, it may as well be about your choices. If you buy the cheapest “shovels” that are actually snow pushers for light, dry snow, they will break if you try to use them for any harder work, like partly frozen snow etc.

t: Can you trust companies that say their plastic products are recyclable? US regulators may crack down on deceptive claims
